segments.text: You must know you've been scheduled to have an operation the day after
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But I don't know the exact time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The operation starts at 10 0 ' clock . But you'll get an injection of anaesthesia about 30 to 45 minutes in advance . If your family comes to see you before the operation , they should come before 8: 30 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . I will tell my wife . Thank you for telling me so much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's nothing . Did your doctor explain to you about what operation you are going to have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . I am going to have my appendix removed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Have you signed the consent ?
segments.speaker: S1
